name: alist
tagline: A self-hosted file listing service for browsing and managing multi-cloud storage
description: AList is a file listing and multi-cloud storage management tool that supports object storage services like S3, WebDAV, and Google Drive. It lets users browse, preview, and share files with ease via a beautiful web UI.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Navigate all your cloud storage with a beautiful web UI. Elegant file exploration

features.title: Media Library
features.description: View images, videos, and documents directly in browser. No downloads needed

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Generate shareable links for files and folders quickly. Collaborate effortlessly

features.title: Webdav Server
features.description: Mount your storage as a network drive on any device. Native file system integration

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure folders and files with password access. Control who sees what

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Queue downloads to your server for later retrieval. Save bandwidth and time
